Caption: Fig. 1. User interface of SurVis, a Web-based visual analytics system to analyze and disseminate literature collections, consisting of a literature overview and a list of publications; versatile interactive selectors allow the user to query the literature collection; the system visualizes the selector agreement in a timeline and using word-sized sparkline visualizations embedded in word clouds.
